attributes.action: re-introduce National Service, withdraw from the EU and stand on our own two feet, increase the fishing limit to 50 miles banning all foreign vessels from our waters, return all utilities to Government ownership, reverse the privatisation of the NHS and stop free heathcare for anyone not a UK resident, close the Channel Tunnel forever and issue a 25 year total ban on immigration immediately, even if they are pop/film/sports stars or just rich like Roman Abramovich and give Government subsidies to farmers to produce food for the UK and any industry who will manufacture anything in the UK, creating wealth and employment for UK workers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vote for this petition, it may change nothing, but it will make you feel a lot better!

rejection.details: Most of these issues are covered by other petitions, it is easier to have one issue per petition.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
